Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to identifying lead water supply mains and service lines through an online interactive map and providing educational resources and tools for preventing lead contamination
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Identifying lead water supply mains and service lines through an online interactive map and providing educational resources and tools for preventing lead contamination.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring notice when contaminants are found in soil
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring notice when contaminants are found in soil.
